Text.Page:
Hello, collector! You came to the right place.
I know you want a valuable card from my collection. But you'll have to work hard!

I will give you one card—"Lighter Than Air"—from my collection, if you bring me 100 pieces of card dust.

My partner will leave a message in the calendar, where you can find out how to go about collecting card dust.

You did a great job!
Nice to work with you! Here's your reward.

That's not enough card dust!

You need to gather 100 Card Dust to get the reward!
